/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees and bushes, providing a stark contrast to the urban buildings that stretch into the distance. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. Power lines crisscross above the road, a common sight in many cities. Cars and trucks can be seen driving on the road, adding to the dynamic nature of the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the vastness of the sky. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees and bushes standing out against the blue of the sky and the gray of the road and buildings. The image provides a glimpse into the daily life in Beijing, showcasing its blend of natural beauty and urban development.
